law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 11, effective February 25, 2010. -- Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 11, effective July 15, 2008.

metadata.lrc-note: (2/25/2010). 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 28, provides that the repeal and reenactment of this section in that Act "shall apply retroactively to July 15, 2008." (7/15/2008). 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 26, provides that this section "shall apply to taxable periods beginning after December 31, 2008."
